title: Mono Kichen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Take-out, Catering, European, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chic designed space, offers a different menu each day with vegan option for appetizer or soup and main dish. Sample vegan dish might be crostini with mushroom, parsley, and risotto; minestrone and baked eggplant with rice and tomato salsa; mushrooms soup and noodles with tofu in green curry; pumpkin soup with salad.
